reporting-org.narrative: Wageningen University & Research - Stichting Wageningen Research

title.narrative: HortiFresh West Africa

description.narrative: By 2021, HortiFresh West Africa will have reached the following target groups: fruit and vegetable producing, processing and trading companies in Ghana and Ivory Coast and their employees; international companies investing in the West African fruit and vegetable sector; financial institutions in Ghana, small-medium enterprises; entrepreneurs; farmers and their farmers associations; women and youth in F&V sector; input dealers; extension workers; agricultural education organisations; policy makers

HortiFresh is a programme supported by the Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands which has prioritized commercial agriculture in its strategic plan of moving from aid to trade. The programme’s goal is to establish “a sustainable and internationally competitive fruit and vegetable sector that contributes to inclusive economic growth, food and nutrition security” in Ghana and Ivory Coast. The HortiFresh programme consists of two components: fruits and vegetables. In Ghana, attention will be given to both the fruit and vegetable sectors. In Ivory Coast the programme will focus on regional fruit supply chains.

The theory of change (ToC) is based on the three pathways that jointly contribute to this overall goal: (1) A competitive and innovative high-value fruit and vegetable sector: HortiFresh West Africa supports the sector through activities and funds that contribute to increasing the value of exports and improving quality and value addition in the domestic market, aiming at reducing imports. (2) An inclusive and sustainable fruit and vegetable sector: HortiFresh will create opportunities for women and youth to engage in the horticulture sector. (3) A conducive business climate that facilitates the development of the fruit and vegetable sector: HortiFresh aims at improving the business climate for SMEs and international companies active in the F&V sector of West Africa . The programme will address other regulatory issues in the area of: imports, registration of crop protection products and food safety.

HortiFresh Trade Promotion Activities Report 2018-2019
Nutrition awareness promoted

description.narrative: As part of the inclusiveness approach, HortiFresh will undertake promotion of nutrition via fruits and vegetable consumption

title.narrative: Number of awareness creation programs/events/write ups/ trainings effected

description.narrative: This covers activities/outreach (TV, print, radio, fairs, advocacy etc.) geared towards creating awareness on public consumption of Fruits and Vegetables. This is aimed at promoting the nutritional value of F&V. The indicator will measure all activities that will fall within this category.

comment.narrative: HortiFresh expects to engage in 20 medium to create awareness on the consumption of fruits and vegetables
Workshop on Nutrition was held in WCDI, Numtrition communication strategy, Gender, Youth and Nutrition strategy and a nutrition survey report were developed in the course of the reporting period

title.narrative: Increased Public-Private sector collaboration

description.narrative: Business-to-Business initiatives include joint business activities or deals resulting from organizing professional meetings, interactive workshops among business

title.narrative: Number of B2B initiatives started as a results of HortiFresh activities

description.narrative: HortiFresh will trach business initiaities implemented as a results of our trade missions and other activities

comment.narrative: HortiFresh expect to see at least 15 initiatives implemented as a results of our B2B activities

HortiFresh partners have initiated a number of partnerships and built on networks created as a results of HortiFresh platorms such as trade mission, fruit and vegetbale fairs. These includes new market channels, export opportunities etc

title.narrative: [DONOR OUTCOME FNS] Increased participation of women and youth in F&V sector

description.narrative: HortFiresh will facilitate creation of reliable jobs created by supported SMEs/Businesses

title.narrative: Number of jobs supported in agricultural chains/sectors

description.narrative: HortiFresh will measure opportunities created for youth and women by measuring new or additional jobs or employment by SMEs/Businesses

comment.narrative: Jobs created under hortifresh partner projects for people below 35
HortFresh will fciltitate the creation of jobs with businesses and SMEs for at least 1500 youth and women
Jobs created under hortifresh partner projects

title.narrative: Increased uptake of innovative technologies and practices (19Q1)

description.narrative: HortiFresh West Africa supports the sector through activities and funds that contribute to increasing the value of exports and improving quality and value addition in the domestic market, aiming at reducing imports.

title.narrative: Number of initiatives (new technologies) adopted by actors

description.narrative: HortiFresh keeps track of any innovative ideas and or practices that implementing partners and beneficiairies make use in the use as a results of HortiFresh support

comment.narrative: In the previous Ghanaveg programme, 43 new technologies have been adopted
HortiFresh targets to see businesses and farmers innovating in their buniesses and activities (new ways of doing things in the fruit and vegetable sector)

65 new initiatives were adopted by partner projects and ooutgrowers working with the HortiFresh project. These inlcuded a 5000sqm Greenhouse, Improved Spray service for BBS control, Improved mango pruning service, Pineapple tissue culture propagation, Cashew grafting.

title.narrative: Number of farmers that adopted research results/ knowledge/new technologies

description.narrative: HortiFresh keeps track of farmers making use of new innovative ideas and or practices as a results of HortiFresh support

title.narrative: Increased export volume and value of fresh and processed Fruit and Vegetables (19Q1)

description.narrative: HortiFresh activities are expeced to impact on the quantity of fruits and vegetables exported from HortiFresh operational countries to other West African countries and outside the WA region.

title.narrative: Percentage increase in volume of export (regional and international)

description.narrative: Measure of the quantity (in metric tons) of fruits and vegetables exported from HortiFresh operational countries to other West African countries and outside the WA region.

comment.narrative: This is the 2017 Ghana volume of fruit and vegetable export reported by GEPA
On the average, HortiFresh targets 35% increase in export of fruits and vegetbales. In Ghana Hortifresh targets 25% inrease in VOLUME of FRUIT export and 50% increase in VOLUME of VEGETABLE export
Target for HortiFresh is to support the fruit sector in Ghana and by extesion Cote d'Ivoire and the Vegetbale sector in Ghana to grow its export volume by 75%.

title.narrative: Percentage increase in value of export (regional and international)

description.narrative: Measure of the USD worth of fruits and vegetables exported from HortiFresh operational countries to other West African countries and outside the WA region.

comment.narrative: This is the 2017 GhanaValue (USD) of fruit and vegetable export reported by GEPA
On the average, HortiFresh targets 25% increase in value of export. In Ghana Hortifresh targets 25% inrease in VALUE of FRUIT export and 25 % increase in VALUE of VEGETABLE export
HortiFresh planned to support the export value of fruits and vegetables grow by 50%.

title.narrative: Increased investment by local and international companies

description.narrative: HortiFresh expects to use the program to facilitate more tradining and partnership among Dutch companies, international companies and Ghanaina businesses

title.narrative: Number of Dutch companies investing in the W? (Ghana/Cote d'Ivoire) F&V sector as a results of HortiFresh activities.
Number of International companies investing in W/A F&V sector as a results of HortiFresh activities
Number of national companies investing in the WA F&V sector as a result of HoriFresh activities

description.narrative: Companies with Dutch origin either located in Ghana and or outside that doing business with or engage in such activities like input supply, service provision etc. with HortiFresh project partners are considered as investing in the F&V sector.
Ghanaian or Ivorian Companies that doing business with or engage in such activities like input supply, service provision etc. doing business in the Horticulture sector

International Companies other than Dutch either located in Ghana and or outside that doing business with or engage in such activities like input supply, service provision etc. with HortiFresh project partners are considered as investing in the F&V sector.

comment.narrative: HortiFresh expects to see about 25 compnies from Ghana and Cote d'Ivoire investing in the F&V sector
37 nationa businesses actively involve in the fruits and vegetable sector in Ghana and CIV
HortiFresh expects to see about 15 International compnies investing in the F&V sector of Ghana and Cote d'Iviore

CropLife is an intiernational company that is working with HortiFresh to support the vegetable sector in a Spray Service provider scheme. Spray gangs are trained to provide professional service to vegetbale and fruit farmers on comercial basis. Other internatonal comapnies are also collaborating with our grant beneficiaries on thier project implementation
HortiFresh expects to see about 15 Dutch compnies investing in the F&V sector of Ghana and Cote d'Iviore
HortiFresh has attracted such Dutch companies like Rabobank foundation, Iribov and Korppert to invest in the fruit and vegetbale sectors in Ghana and Ivory Coast

title.narrative: Improved performance of the regulatory system

description.narrative: HortiFresh in supporting the F&V sector will work to support agencieis, bodies or associations that aim to regulate and stadardise operations in the horticulture sector.

title.narrative: Number of Horticultural councils and or private sector associations established with HortiFresh collboration

description.narrative: HortiFresh will support the sector to be vibrant be collaborators to establish bodies that will serves as mouthpiece to work on resolving issues of common interest to actors in the fruit and vegetable sector

comment.narrative: HortiFresh plans to establish at least 4 bodies or association to support the secotr regulatroy issues
Negotiations underway to establish the Horticulture Development Council

title.narrative: Increased phytosanitary and food safety systems in the F&V sector

description.narrative: HortiFresh will collborate with fruits and vegetable actors to work towards reduction in interceptions of exports

title.narrative: Number of interceptions related to fruits and vegetables exported to EU market per year

description.narrative: Export of fruits and vegetables especially to EU markets are expected to be free from infestation

comment.narrative: HortiFresh expects to work with actors to put in place measure that will reduce interceptions by 50% on exports from Ghana and Cote d'Ivoire
Recorded figure covers fruit and vegetbale export from Ghana and Cote d'Ivoire.

title.narrative: Improved Access to finance

description.narrative: HortiFresh will explore for opportunities for project partners to access commercial loans to expand and grow their businesses

title.narrative: Number of businesses/SMEs that have accessed commercial financial products developed by HortiFresh

description.narrative: HortiFresh will develop financial products and facilitateits financing by pitching producers and companies business plans for loans, equity, etct. It excludes grants, government subsidies, budgetary support of other projects.

comment.narrative: HortiFresh expects to faciltiate access to commercial loans for at least 40 SMEs/bunsinesses by clsoe of the project

title.narrative: Increased number of SME/Business with GAP certification

description.narrative: HortiFresh will work with sector actors to improve food safety

title.narrative: Number of certified Green Lable Market outlets in Ghana

description.narrative: Green Label is a national certification scheme in Ghana for furits and vegetables food safety measurement

comment.narrative: HortiFresh will work with sector actors to facilitate businesses onto the Ghana Green label Scheme
Two market outlets has signed onto the GreenLabel Scheme showcasing products(fruits and Vegetbales) certified under the scheme

title.narrative: Increased and sustained economic viability of actors in the F&V VC

description.narrative: Returns on investments made in businesses in the Fruits and Vegetable Sector will make the sector more viable

title.narrative: Percentage increse in turnover of SMEs/Businesses supported (USD$ per annum)

description.narrative: HortiFresh expects to see an increase in the income of busniesses and producers working in the Fruit and vagetable sector

comment.narrative: HortiFresh expect to see 20% increase in turnover by project partners over the GhanaVeg figure

title.narrative: [DONOR OUTCOME FNS] Performance of family farming systems increased

description.narrative: Technical business and agronomic support by HortiFresh aims to improve the productivity levels of implementing partners.

title.narrative: Number of family farms with increased productivity and/or income

description.narrative: Households that expericnces improvement in the quantity and value of produce per HortiFresh activities with them

comment.narrative: Male/Female headed that are between 18 years and 35.
Tacking of this indicators is from project beginning, no data exist on this
Tacking of this indicators is from project beginning, no data exist on this
HortiFresh targets to see increased producitvity among in 500 Fruit farmers in Ghana and Cote d'Ivoire and 1,000 Vegetables farmers in Ghana (30% of which must be women)
Comaprative data yet to be collected to get change in income levels

title.narrative: Increased volume and value of fresh and processed F&V in domestic markets

description.narrative: The HortiFresh program expects see growth in the domestic market interms supply of fresh fruits and vegetables

title.narrative: Percentage change in value of fresh and processed F&V supplied to the domestic markets
Percentage change in value of imported F&V supplied to the domestic markets

description.narrative: HortiFresh tracks the quantum of fruits and vegetables supplied by partners to the local markets.
The value of import of fresh and processed fruits and vegetables are expected to reduce with the activities of HortiFresh project partners

comment.narrative: This is 2017 data from MoTI on vegetbale imports
Reduction of import of fruits and vegetables by 25% is expected to be reached by the close of the program
2020 figure not available yet
HortiFresh expects to see 20% increase in supply of Fruits and vegetables to local markets
These are value of fruits and vegetables supplied by HortiFresh project pertners to local markets in 2020

title.narrative: [DONOR OUTCOME FNS] Direct family farms/actors benefitting from activities to improve sector performance

description.narrative: The program to will directly benefit producers, outgrowers,bunisnesses, agronomists and other actors in the Horticulture secotor of Ghana and Cote dÍvoire

title.narrative: Total number of farmers reached (direct)

description.narrative: HortiFresh activities will directly impact actors in the Horticulture sector

comment.narrative: This includes female farmes reached are farmers, students trained and other project beneficiaries accessing the project interventions such as agronomy training, cluster activities, access to finance as well as innovation and youth employment grants
The HortiFresh Project expects to benefit and or impact at least 15,000 male and female including youth

This includes male farmes reached are farmers, students trained and other project beneficiaries accessing the project interventions such as agronomy training, cluster activities, access to finance as well as innovation and youth employment grants

This includes youth(male/female) farmes reached are farmers, students trained and other project beneficiaries accessing the project interventions such as agronomy training, cluster activities, access to finance as well as innovation and youth employment grants

title.narrative: [DONOR OUTCOME FNS] Family farms benefitting from activities to improve performance

description.narrative: The program to will indirectly benefit producers, outgrowers,bunisnesses, agronomists and other actors in the Horticulture secotor of Ghana and Cote dÍvoire

title.narrative: Number of family farms with improved access to input and/or output markets

description.narrative: Access to inputs and market is keen on HortiFresh appraoch to support the fruits and vegetable secotor

comment.narrative: These includes female farmers that HortFresh has facilitated their access to inputs and markets through input pitching sessions, trade mission, fruit and vegetbale fairs etc.
HortiFresh expects to see 30% of producers and businesses beneficitng from the program to have access to inputs and or markets
These includes male farmers that HortFresh has facilitated their access to inputs and markets through input pitching sessions, trade mission, fruit and vegetbale fairs etc.
These includes youth (male/female) farmers that HortFresh has facilitated their access to inputs and markets through input pitching sessions, trade mission, fruit and vegetbale fairs etc.

title.narrative: Total number of farmers reached (indirect)

description.narrative: HortiFresh activities will indirectly impact actors in the Horticulture sector

comment.narrative: This includes female Farmers, students and other beneficiaries benefiting from ripple effect/benefit of HortiFresh activities (*4 of direct beneficiaries)

The HortiFresh project will indirectly benefit at least 60,000 actors in the fruit and cegetable sectors. This is on the assumption that 1 direct benefiriciary will impact at least 4 other actor. This will be through our input facilitation, market linkages, B2B, capacity building among others
This includes male Farmers, students and other beneficiaries benefiting from ripple effect/benefit of HortiFresh activities (*4 of direct beneficiaries)
This includes youth(male/female) Farmers, students and other beneficiaries benefiting from ripple effect/benefit of HortiFresh activities (*4 of direct beneficiaries)

title.narrative: Improved Technical Agronomic support (19Q1)

description.narrative: Various agronomic trainings and trainings of trainers are being organized contributing to enhanced productivity, value and quality of fruits and vegetables

title.narrative: Number of participants enrolled in the various modules in agronomy

description.narrative: Tracking of beneficiries of respective agronomic sessions for farmers, Extension Serivce providers and Tutors of students in agronomy

comment.narrative: In the previous HortiFresh project 60 agronomists have been trained
HortiFresh expectts to impart on 200 tuttors and agronomist who can replicate training onto farmers and students in the fruit and vegetable sector
Cummuatively HortiFresh has trained 200 both public and private Agric Exension Assistants in varous modules in agronomy based on WCDI agronomy module
30% of beneficiiries of the HortiFresh training are expected to be female
